part6.title: Trade Ranking

rules.rule1: 1. This promotion starts from 2018-1-26 2:30 AM (UTC), and it will be closed until further notice.
rules.rule2: 2. Login every day to get random SanC reward distributed by CoinToBe.
rules.rule3: 3. Depositing any coin at any amount will get random SanC reward distributed by CoinToBe.
rules.rule4: 4. Rewards will be distrituted within one to three business days after the promotion. You could check it in the assets of your account.
rules.rule5: 5. Accounts will be banned in this promotion if any cheating is found.

part6.tip2: Investing in digital assets comes with high risks due to huge price fluctuations. Before investing, please have a full understanding of all the risks of investing in digital assets and be prudent of your own investment decisions.
part6.tip3: *CoinToBe reserves the right of final interpretation.If you have further question, please let us know by
part6.tip4: clicking help or going to the support.
